alert.note: Alert for West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 05 at 2:30AM PST until February 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT....Snow Showers...heavy at times. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible above 5000 feet, locally up to 17 inches. Wind gusts up to 50 mph over higher terrain at times. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada, including Interstate 80 over Donner Pass, Highway 50 over Echo Summit and Highway 88 over Carson Pass. * WHEN...In effect until 10 PM PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult with slick roads and chain requirements. Gusty wind could reduce visibilities in blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels 3500 to 4500 feet.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
